name: Cookie Moonster Dreamland
description:
You are the moon. You are in an infinite hallway full of infinite cookies, which you love.

Press left or right to roll.
Tap Shift repeatedly to use your moon powers to fly.
Eating cookies makes you heavier.

Which way will you go? Left? Right? ...Up? Will it matter?

(It's not really a game yet... more of an "experience". It was made for the Weekly Game Jam 87 ("Infinite Hallway"), but I started four days late. Oops.)

Assets used are public domain.

Tools used:

Construct 2
Bosca Ceoil
Paint.NET
